biography.content: Fabio Giglietto PhD, is Professor of Internet Studies at the Department of Communication Sciences, Humanities and International Studies at the University of Urbino Carlo Bo, where he also teaches Internet Studies. His main research interests are theory of information, communication, and society with a specific focus on the relationships between social systems, media and digital technologies. On these topics, he has published extensively in journals such as the Journal of Communication, Information, Communication & Society, the Journal of Broadcasting and Electronic Media, Social Media + Society, and Social Science Computer Review.
